name: Story Agent Comprehensive Evaluation Set
description: Comprehensive evaluation scenarios for story_agent covering various keyword combinations, edge cases, and story quality metrics.

session_input.user_input: Create a story about an enchanted forest, a glowing mushroom, and a talking squirrel.

conversation.user_content: Create a story about an enchanted forest, a glowing mushroom, and a talking squirrel.

final_response.story: In the heart of an enchanted forest, a young adventurer named Elara followed a talking squirrel named Squeaky. They were searching for the legendary glowing mushroom, said to grant a single wish. The forest was alive with magic, with ancient trees whispering secrets to the wind.

main_characters.name: Elara
main_characters.description: A young girl with bright, curious eyes and long, braided brown hair. She wears practical leather boots, a green tunic, and carries a small satchel filled with maps and snacks.

main_characters.name: Squeaky
main_characters.description: A small, fluffy red squirrel with a twitching nose and unusually intelligent, dark eyes. He wears a tiny, hand-woven acorn cap.

scenes.title: The Whispering Woods
scenes.description: Elara meets Squeaky and they decide to team up to find the glowing mushroom.
scenes.text: Elara ventured deep into the enchanted forest, its canopy a dense ceiling of green. 'You're going the wrong way!' a tiny voice chirped. She looked down to see a red squirrel. 'I'm Squeaky,' he said. 'The glowing mushroom is this way, but it's dangerous.' Elara, intrigued by the talking squirrel, agreed to follow him.

scenes.title: The River of Riddles
scenes.description: They must cross a magical river by solving a riddle from the River Spirit.
scenes.text: Their path was blocked by a shimmering river. A watery form rose, the River Spirit. 'Answer my riddle to pass,' it gurgled. Squeaky, surprisingly wise, whispered the answer to Elara. 'What has an eye, but cannot see?' she asked. 'A needle!' The spirit smiled and a bridge of light appeared.

scenes.title: The Mushroom's Glow
scenes.description: They find the glowing mushroom in a hidden cave behind a waterfall.
scenes.text: Behind a cascading waterfall, they found a hidden cave. In the center, a magnificent mushroom pulsed with a soft, ethereal light. The air hummed with power. 'We found it!' Elara whispered, her eyes wide with wonder. The glowing mushroom was more beautiful than any story had described.

scenes.title: A Simple Wish
scenes.description: Elara makes a selfless wish to protect the forest and its creatures.
scenes.text: Squeaky looked at Elara. 'What will you wish for?' he asked. Elara thought for a moment, then smiled. 'I wish for the enchanted forest and all its creatures to be safe forever.' The mushroom flared with brilliant light, and a wave of warmth spread through the forest. Her wish was granted.

session_input.user_input: Tell me a story about a cyberpunk city, a stolen data chip, and a laser grid.

conversation.user_content: Tell me a story about a cyberpunk city, a stolen data chip, and a laser grid.

final_response.story: In the neon-drenched cyberpunk city of Neo-Kyoto, a rogue hacker named Jyn has just stolen a data chip containing the secrets of the OmniCorp. Now, she must escape the corporate tower, but a deadly laser grid stands in her way.

main_characters.name: Jyn
main_characters.description: A woman in her late 20s with sharp, angular features, a cybernetic left eye that glows faintly, and short, black hair with neon blue streaks. She wears a sleek, black jumpsuit with reinforced armor plates.

scenes.title: The Heist
scenes.description: Jyn snatches the data chip from the OmniCorp mainframe.
scenes.text: Jyn slid the data chip from the mainframe's core. Alarms blared across the cyberpunk city. Her cybernetic eye scanned the schematics; her only escape was through the sub-level, past the laser grid. The chip felt cold in her palm, a dangerous weight of information.

scenes.title: The Crimson Grid
scenes.description: Jyn confronts the complex laser grid blocking her escape.
scenes.text: She reached the vault door. Beyond it, a web of crimson beams danced in a deadly, silent rhythm. The laser grid was state-of-the-art, a beautiful and lethal puzzle. One wrong move and she'd be incinerated. She took a deep breath, her heart pounding against her ribs.

scenes.title: A Hacker's Dance
scenes.description: Using her skills and agility, Jyn navigates the laser grid.
scenes.text: Jyn moved with a fluid grace, a dance between the beams of light. She contorted her body, flipping and sliding across the polished floor. Her cybernetic eye helped her predict the grid's shifting patterns. It was a high-stakes performance, with death as the only audience.

scenes.title: Escape to the Undercity
scenes.description: Jyn deactivates the grid and escapes into the city's lower levels.
scenes.text: With a final leap, she cleared the last beam and slammed her hand on the deactivation panel. The laser grid vanished. The path was clear. Jyn slipped into the shadows of the undercity, the stolen data chip secure, ready to expose OmniCorp's crimes to the world.
